dc:title: On Pilgrimage - March/April 1978
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Jottings while convalescing--visitors, books she is reading, music on the radio. Reflects on vocation and the infludence of Fr. Hugo on her life.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 585 1978-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
